name: Ben Shapiro: The Game
description:
This game was made for a summer assignment at my school so here you go:

The Constitution is in trouble and Ben Shapiro needs your help. Protect the constitution from the floating heads of its enemies. Use your facts to stomp out their feelings in this mediocre at best game.
